function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vulnerable households at risk of water supply cut off, leading to a threat to public health due to the inability to practice regular handwashing","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus due to the lack of handwashing, posing a threat to public health","Mitigation":"Suspension of water supply shut offs, extended payment window times, application of discounts, and provision of clean water supply","Technologies":"Water treatment and supply technologies, remote monitoring for water plants","People":"Vulnerable households, water utility staff","Owner":"Water utilities, government authorities"},{"Description":"Decreased revenue from water service leading to potential costly breakdowns and permanent closure of businesses or industries","Impact":"Financial strain on water utilities and potential breakdowns in the water supply","Mitigation":"Financial support, extended payment options, investment in infrastructure maintenance","Technologies":"Financial management tools, predictive maintenance technology for infrastructure","People":"Water utilities, businesses, industries","Owner":"Water utilities, government authorities"},{"Description":"Safe working conditions and protective equipment required for water utility staff","Impact":"Risk of exposure to the virus and compromised ability to provide safe water supply","Mitigation":"Provision of protective equipment, implementation of physical distancing measures, remote work where possible","Technologies":"Protective equipment, remote monitoring and communication tools","People":"Water utility staff, management","Owner":"Water utilities, workplace management"}]}
